title: Development a continuation of earlier development

content.question: The development by the early 1900s depicted in the excerpt represented a continuation of which of the following earlier developments?

choices.label: The growth of the middle class during the Gilded Age
The spread of religious revivals during the Second Great Awakening
The federal support for transportation such as transcontinental railroads
The persistence of ethnic cultures in many immigrant communities after the 1870s

content.answer: The growth of the middle class during the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
